results.definition: a bank check drawn on insufficient funds at another bank in order to take advantage of the float
a bank check that has been fraudulently altered to increase its face value
any of several small graceful hawks of the family Accipitridae having long pointed wings and feeding on insects and small animals

examples: They kited the Red Dragon model

results.definition: get credit or money by using a bad check
examples: The businessman kited millions of dollars

results.definition: increase the amount (of a check) fraudulently
plaything consisting of a light frame covered with tissue paper; flown in wind at end of a string
soar or fly like a kite
examples: The pilot kited for a long time over the mountains
